titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on Metalaxyl-M and LMetalaxylfenoxam.
To extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on Metalaxyl-M and LMetalaxylfenoxam.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily provide for the duty treatment of Metalaxyl-M and LMetalaxylfenoxam.
